body:
Hi,

I'm getting the following error message with the HB_setHDRExposure component:

1. Solution exception:global name 'HDRFilePath' is not defined

The HDR file was correctly created with the HB_runDaylightAnalysis. Connecting its output with the HB_HDR > GIF (for instance) works fine.

Can be a bug there?

Thanks,

-A.

replies.body:
This was a bug! Fixed and pushed to github. Also attached!
[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/W8k9GghxLBtB6xBKbaxkPQ4cNrDB9w1TUp4CnUYT6Uka6WyJva-HbmpUCqgs34Zx17ESa-v6hjVPRHpAQnrA2ixBlKFYRRoz/setExposure.png)
